Reviews.Title: Money Very Well Spent
Reviews.Author: DW
Reviews.Content: Very Much Impressed thus far...nice size in comparison to other smart phones, good battery life and nice reponse time. Everyone loves it. I LOVE the Footprints....

Reviews.Title: HTC Touch Cruise 09 T4242
Reviews.Author: Belleza "MLA"
Reviews.Content: GREAT PHONE, I LOVE IT. EXCELLENT FOR PEOPLE THAT NEED TO BE CONNECTED WITH WORK, GPS, WIFI, BLUETHOOH.ALL YOU CAN FIND  IN ONE PHONE.

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Quad-Band Unlocked GSM cell phone compatible with 850/900/1800/1900 GSM and 900/2100 3G frequencies plus GPRS/EDGE capabilities
Processor: Qualcomm® MSM7225?, 528 MHz; Windows Mobile® 6.1 Professional; Memory: ROM: 512 MB RAM: 256 MB; 2.8-inch TFT-LCD touch screen with QVGA resolution
HTC TouchFLO?; 4-Way Navigation Wheel with Enter button; HTC Footprints? button; Internal GPS antenna; Bluetooth® 2 A2DP, Wi-Fi; 3.2 MP camera, microSD? memory card.
Up to 6 hours of talk time, up to 330 hours of standby time
ProductInfo.Name: HTC T4242 Touch Cruise Unlocked Smartphone with 3.2 MP Camera, Windows Mobile 6.1, Wi-Fi, GPS --International Version with Warranty (Black)
